00041 #define ISR_DISABLE     myusart->idr = (AVR32_USART_IDR_TXRDY_MASK | AVR32_USART_IDR_RXRDY_MASK); //Disable transmit and receive interrupt
00042 #define ISR_ENABLE              myusart->ier = (AVR32_USART_IER_TXRDY_MASK | AVR32_USART_IER_RXRDY_MASK); //Enable transmit and receive interrupt

00049 #define SERIAL_BUFFSIZE 128
